medium: Lithographs with hand-coloring on hand-made paper in linen portfolio box
title: Study for "He Laughed", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark LC: [S.P. NA 1990]
description: Full length portrait of a man in long pants, naked from the waist up; he stands facing the viewer with his hands on his hips; the words \"He laughed\" inscribed, UC; predominant colors: blue, grey and yellow
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
